title: AGAIN REQUESTING SOME SORT OF HELP
body:
Ok so I created a thread on Sunday this week - mentioning that after about a month of not playing League, I went to log in and found that my password was no longer logging in as before, so after numerous attempts to log in with what I though to be correct details, I gave up and sent through an email request to get a password reset.

And here it gets frustrating...


I have not received any password reset emails. I have sent...we'll say...many...requests to my email - but nothing.
Why I thought? What is going on?

So after not getting any luck with Riot's password reset function, I opened a ticket. On Sunday. It is now Friday Afternoon and I have yet to receive ANY email from Riot regarding this.

Considering all my billing information is on this account, this is worrysome at best from Riot. What the fuck is going on?

Help me for fucks sake

replies.body:
Hey there,

I tried to find your ticket but had no luck. What is the summoner name of the account you're trying to get the password reset on?

...................
why is it not surprising that Riot themselves have no idea what's going on either...

Acc name - muely11

Answers pls.

When neither the email address nor the name of the account your posting on is the same as what is presented in the ticket, it can be hard to find the ticket manually. But thanks for replying back, I found it with that info.

Sorry for the wait. Our account recovery tickets are fairly backed up right now due to a lot of holiday scams. Your account looks to have fallen prey to one of these scams and had it's email changed, which is why the password resets weren't working for you.

I'll follow up with you in the ticket.

Dont worry... you guys are doing great.
Seems just like a usual salty dude. :|
